general_advisory: Farmers are advised to prepare nursery beds, treat seeds before sowing, mulch seedlings, provide irrigation, use herbicides, and follow specific crop stage advisories.

advisory: Basal Fertilizer Application: Apply DAP, MOP, and Urea as per soil type and seedling age for high yield.
White grab: Minimize infestation by drenching Chloropyriphos or Imidacloprid at the plant base.
Planting stage: Apply DAP, MOP, and FYM at planting time, top dress with Urea at intervals, avoid late Urea application.
Hairy caterpillar: Control by spraying specific insecticides as needed.
Dimond Back Moth and Head Borer management: Monitor and destroy pests, use Neem based pesticides or chemical sprays.
To control red palm weevil: Apply specific pesticide in stem holes.
To control sigatoka leaf spot: Spray specified fungicides as preventive measure.
Prevent EUS (Epizootic ulcerative syndrome) by applying 'Cifax' as a preventive measure.
